amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology to transmit to Congress a 3-year programmatic and operational plan for the Manufacturing Extension Partnership program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-227 to require the Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) to provide to the House Science Committee and the Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation a 3-year programmatic and operational plan for the MEP; and to require the plan to include comments of the MEP National Advisory Board and of the State partners.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gordon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
